plain: Based on the user's favourite books, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is horror/fantasy, their favourite plot is retellings of classic stories, their favourite setting is a fictional world, their favourite writing style is descriptive and atmospheric, their favourite length is novella/novel, their favourite topic is fairy tales/mythology, their favourite pacing is slow-burn, their favourite narrative structure is non-linear, and their favourite themes are beauty and the beast, dragons, and horror elements.
